short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to debug and view ShareChat Pixel events.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to debug and view ShareChat Pixel events.

The ShareChat Pixel works in the background to look for conversion or ShareChat pixels and provide realtime feedback on the implementation. On clicking, a small panel pops out showing the details of events that were configured on the website and gives out relevant success and error messages.
